item.title: Building an Isomorphic Webapp
item.author: xiaoyun@looseleafapp.com (Xiaoyun Yang)
item.description: I’ve always lived by the “Separation of Concern” principle when it comes to software design. Recently, I’ve came to love a new design pattern for web apps called the isomorphic web app that sacrifices some of the simplicity of a SPA with a backend API for a significant boost in performance.
